full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

* **Solicitation Title:** Agriculture and Mental Health Literacy Training
* **Reference Number:** cb-6197-52683738
* **Solicitation Number:** 01B68-23-0026
* **Publication Date:** June 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 18, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procedure:**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking proposals for the development and delivery of agricultural literacy training to mental health practitioners. The training aims to enhance the capacity of mental health practitioners to support the mental health of members of the agriculture community, particularly during severe events and their aftermath.

**Services Required:**

Development and delivery of agricultural literacy training to mental health practitioners across Canada, targeting 250 professionals, to:

1. Sensitize them to the particularities of the agriculture sector and its unique challenges and needs.
2. Equip them to support the mental health of members of the agriculture community, especially during severe events and their aftermath.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Important Deadlines:**

* Tender Closing Date: July 18, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

**Contact Information:**

Kyle Harrington
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca
(555) 555-5555

**Attachments:**

Available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6197/01b68-23-0026-agricultural-mental-health-literarcy-development-and-training-amd1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6197/01b68-23-0026-agricultural-mental-health-literarcy-development-and-training-amd1.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6197/01b68-23-0026-agricultural-mental-health-literacy-developmment-and-training---final.pdf](
